website_summaries.verdict: The OluKai Alapa Li is highly lauded for the comfort it delivers. One of its sought-after features, the patented Drop-In Heel, gained the favor of consumers as it quickly transforms the look. On the other hand, despite having a mesh upper, there were reports that it developed an awful stink because it doesn’t dry fast enough. But overall, style- and performance-wise, repeat buyers recommend this trainer.
pros: Almost all of the owners rave about how comfortable the OluKai Alapa Li is for all-day wear
This pair of walking shoes is excellent for land, and water usage says a majority of reviewers
Many users are pleased that they can wash this trainer if it gets dirty or starts to smell
A good number of individuals love that this footgear has a light and breathable top, making it suitable for warm weather
The collapsible back appeals to multiple shoppers
According to a lot of people, the sporty look partners well with shorts, jeans, and even khakis
cons: Some consumers have mentioned that the forefoot section of the Alapa Li feels tighter compared to other OluKai walking shoes of the same size
A few folks are disgusted that this model developed an awful stink, and it doesn’t dry as fast they had hoped for
One commenter has complained that after a month of use, the upper separated from where it attaches to the sole

customer_reviews.title: Not for Wet Conditions at All
customer_reviews.text: I had these with me for a trip to Vietnam, and they did not do well at all in the rain and other wet conditions. The insert soaks up the water and doesn't dry out (in the humidity), and the upper doesn't do much better. They began to stink like mad, and I had to throw them out. Also, there's no arch support, and the white sole is for some reason impossible to clean. Maybe they're good for other things, but don't get them near water.
customer_reviews.author: T. Roper

customer_reviews.title: Greatest shoe of all-time?
customer_reviews.text: I will say these shoes have far exceeded my expectations. I wore them for 4 days at Disney World and can't believe how well my feet felt afterward. I had a pair of Brooks running shoes I planned on alternating days and I just never took these off my feet. Amazing shoe. I don't recommend wearing socks with them. Just get some odor-eaters and put them in over night. The insoles are machine washable too. The breathable mesh keep my feet from getting too sweaty. I have already bought another pair in a different color. The navy blue one's look really good under pants as well if you have to dress them up a bit. Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Magnificent7

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, but they run small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I have a pair of the Moloas that I absolutely love and was looking for some casual summer shoes. I really like the style and color, but unfortunately these run quite a bit narrower than the Moloas, and although I ordered the same size, they don't fit my wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ringo

customer_reviews.title: If you have high arches this
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! If you have a high arch in your feet these shoes will be a problem ....the elastic acting like shoelaces is pretty snug on my foot across the tops of your feet
customer_reviews.author: Gizzco 777

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe that is NOT anti-microbial.
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and own many of them. However, this particular shoe is NOT anti-microbial as it states. The stink that came from this shoe after only a few wears is almost unbearable. I have to spray the shoe down with Febreze after every wear just so I can keep wearing them. This has not been an issue with my other Olukai’s but definitely with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Joan E. Morillo

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy casual shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are fantastic. They are a nice balance between casual and business casual (yeah I know...huge differentiation there, but figured I’d mention it). I normally wear a size 11 and the size 11 in these fit perfect. The width is also spot on. The cushioning is nice but not obnoxious or completely missing. One very nice feature is these are also designed to be worn as slip-ons. The back of the shoe had a special sewn in section to withstand being used as slip-ons. I can’t give much info on how well they hold up since I’ve only had them for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Toe box narrow
customer_reviews.text: Toe box is narrow and going up a size won’t work because shoe will be too big. Loved the look and a loyal fan of Olukai. These just don’t work for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: B. Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Try it in person before you buy
customer_reviews.text: I am a shoe guy. I am very particular about these parameters: arc support, breathability of the fabric, comfort and aesthetics of the shoes. I will spend $$$ as long is as it meets or above and beyond these parameters. So far, my evaluations of Olukai ( ‘Alapa Li )...It has failes all the parameters of a comfortable and ideal fit shoes. My hospital job requires me to move around performing various clinical lab testing so these shoe parameters are a must and Olukai did not pass the litmus test.
customer_reviews.author: Dariel7

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, but they are a touch tight on the top of my foot and leaves marks where the laces are. It isn't uncomfortable, so I am keeping them and enjoying the style and comfortable of these shoes. Just be aware if you have a "tall" foot, these may be a touch snug.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Needed a sock-less shoe that would be good enough to wear in a restaurant in the evening and wear around the water during the day. I have several Olukai shoes. All are 9.5. This one fits consistently. The toe box is narrower than the others I have but it’s perfectly comfortable. Note this shoe is for getting wet. So it’s snug with the neoprene and the heel up. I only mention it because some olukai’s break in and have very loose fits.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: These are great summer sneakers/shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I had a blue pair that I'm wearing all the time during the summer when I don't have my Olukai Sandals on my feet, so I decided to order a black pair. These are marginally smaller even though I ordered the same size but I'm expecting them to break in over the next few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C

customer_reviews.title: 8.5 is true to size
customer_reviews.text: Really love this shoe. I got the charcoal/charcoal in size 8.5 which is my regular size. I prefer shoes with a roomy toe box and this shoe is fine. I thought maybe with the slip on feature they would be tight but I don’t consider these too tight. Light and well cushioned good for walking in.
customer_reviews.author: dominic

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: For a casual shoe, these are really great. The heel of the shoe folds in to allow you to just slip them on if you want, but for a casual night out with friends or just running around during the day, these are comfortable and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe, narrow toe box
customer_reviews.text: I would say to get them a 1/2 size larger than the normal Olukais as the toebox is narrow. They still fit and look great, but I can feel my big toes touching where the edge come into the point of the show.
customer_reviews.author: BSki

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a surprise for my husband. He loved them. He wears them with or without socks. They fit true to size and he said they are very comfortable. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, fit and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are great; I've gotten a lot of compliments on them and they fit true to size. Comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Fits small
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 12 in all my other shoes from Oulakai -- these are a bit small. Unfortunately, there's no 12.5. Very comfortable -- but, sizing is a bit off.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: Favorite shoes of the season. Super comfortable. Only one negative - totally not waterproof. Watch out for rain or wet grass if you want these to look like new longer.
customer_reviews.author: Spalding

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide foot and a high arch. The shoe fits well with the exception that the top of the shoe above the arch is a bit tight. That makes it a bit difficult to get on so I use a shoe horn, I don't wear it with the heel folded down. It is a very stretchy material so it conforms to your foot. All in all a good, semi dressy shoe for summer wear.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Haynes

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my dad’s birthday. He wears them to work almost everyday!! He says they are really comfortable and he is on his feet for most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Lalla D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but a tad pricey
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light weight casual shoe. It is very flexible, almost like walking barefoot. And it’s stylish cool, too! But is it worth the extra cash?
customer_reviews.author: Daveydog

customer_reviews.title: Super narrow
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these were way too narrow for my feet. I really liked the way they look, but just too narrow. Had to send them back, and ended up buying something else.
customer_reviews.author: Shayne

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet so I had to exchange for a 12 instead of normal 11.5. The 12 fits okay for my width but the shoes are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: James Ryan Brawley

customer_reviews.title: Not much Sole!
customer_reviews.text: Sole is really thin, especially for a heavy person. Not much support. Sketchers are much more comfortable and cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck U

customer_reviews.title: Great looking hipster boat shoe
customer_reviews.text: The fit is excellent and the sole is suitable for use on wet decks unlike the other offerings from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C Cain

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purcase of this shoe
customer_reviews.text: A husband with a size 14 shoe has literally worn his first pair to the point of no return. The second pair was well received. The man would wear these to BED if we let home. Ultimate comfort fit for 3 of the 4 seasons.
customer_reviews.author: DKBMcG

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: i was looking for slippers or flip-flops. these are the best of both.
customer_reviews.author: James Redpath

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and well built, typical of OLUKAI. I have several pair of OLUKAI shoes and each pair is of the best quality, very comfortable and long lasting. Buy OLUKAI and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: James Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable shoe. Light weight and fits well. It looks good, too.
customer_reviews.author: rcc

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These have very good arch support. Can be worn comfortably with no sock. With no sock I bought a 9.5 and it was perfect. If I wanted to wear a sock I would go to a 10 which is my regular shoe size
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L Deren

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes yet
customer_reviews.text: For comfortable and durable. Can dress up or wear to lake. High quality
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: took around 30 miles worth of walking in nyc. worked great
customer_reviews.author: sdds111

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Sizes are all over the place. I’m normally a size 11, purchased size 10 and it was too big so I returned them, purchased a 9.5 and they are way too small. Guess the shoes aren’t made true to size like some reviews mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Passmore

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Like the look and fit of the shoe. Casual is the way to go these days and these fit the part! Big hit at home with my wife and kids too.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brighindi

customer_reviews.title: Great slip on’s.
customer_reviews.text: These slip on’s are very comfortable and look great. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Christoph L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for traveling. They slip on and off easily but are fit enough to provide stability when walking. One of the benefits its he heel is designed to fold over to make them even easier to slip on and off and walk through security at the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and stylish all the same!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return for 1/2 size bigger to allow socks if needed, but happy to have the fit I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Conan C.

customer_reviews.title: You need to wear these...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes. Slip on easily with no laces to tie. Super comfortable. Can get wet and dries out quickly. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Frederick A Edmond

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe ever!
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all. This is my favorite shoe I’ve ever purchased. I’ll be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Wolverine66

customer_reviews.title: Great summer shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like Olukai shoes. I was picking up a different pair and saw these, decided to try them, and have another pair I really like.
customer_reviews.author: Washington Clark

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to put on and comfortable. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Says

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes and this brand. They wash well and he wears them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: leslee phillips

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, great look. Exactly what I’ve come to expect from Olukai
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Classy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the fit. They look good and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable, good support for everyday walking, like how I can just slip them on like Flip flops to run out to the car or go out side quick
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my trip to Hawaii and they worked perfect for all activities
customer_reviews.author: TimO Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have almost zero support. My flip flops are more comfortable. They need to beef up the padding a little and a little more arch support. I wont buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The toes are a little tight.....
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe, But the toes are a little tighter than my other Ola Kais.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Tailgater

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am on my feet a lot and it is so comfortable and gives great support
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: fit of shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like it ,but it is little narrow by toes
customer_reviews.author: haxel

customer_reviews.title: Nice modern style.
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple other pairs of Olukai that I love. This shoe is slightly narrower in fit and appearance. Great look with shorts from casual to more dressy. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Fit and style are tops
customer_reviews.text: I saw these in the store, but they did not have my size, I went online and ordered the correct size. Fit great and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Huibregtse

customer_reviews.title: good arch support
customer_reviews.text: Probably more of a narrow vs wide. Nice tight fit. Good arch support
customer_reviews.author: K. Fallick

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, cool, comfortable, good traction
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, cool, comfortable, good traction. I use it for boating & fly fishing and it’s about as snag free as a shoe can be.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie W.

customer_reviews.title: Liiiiiike a Glovvvveeee! (Ace Ventura Voice)
customer_reviews.text: Got these and a pair of Allbirds with the intention of the most comfy shoe coming with me to Disney World. These were the winner hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Addison Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My dad loved them. He has wide feet and they recommended he size up a whole size and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Everything olukai makes is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great for slip on quick to go shoes very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, functional and stylish. These are great shoes that look great and feel just right.
customer_reviews.author: David Rosuck

product_meta.title: OLUKAI Men's 'Alapa Li
product_meta.description: Be weekend-ready any day of the week with the OluKai® 'Alapa Li sneaker. Uppers of engineered mesh with high-character, antiquated full-grain leather accents. Elastic laces for a long-lasting customized fit. Collapsible-back shoe features a fold-down heel counter that allows it to be worn as a slip-on or a slide. Removable single-density EVA footbed with a custom floral print. Versatile Drop-In Heel® offers both a shoe and slide functionality. Lightweight, molded EVA midsole with a non-marking Wet Grip Rubber outsole, podded and siped for added traction on wet surfaces. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 10 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Be weekend-ready any day of the week with the OluKai® 'Alapa Li sneaker.
Uppers of engineered mesh with high-character, antiquated full-grain leather accents.
Elastic laces for a long-lasting customized fit.
Collapsible-back shoe features a fold-down heel counter that allows it to be worn as a slip-on or a slide.

Removable single-density EVA footbed with a custom floral print. Versatile Drop-In Heel® offers both a shoe and slide functionality. Lightweight, molded EVA midsole with a non-marking Wet Grip Rubber outsole, podded and siped for added traction on wet surfaces. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 10 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
